column4: Is it possible to Sync an Ipod 6th Gen with Ubuntu yet? I've been searching the net for an answer but I can't find something conclusive.
Why not try and find out? Banshee has some iPod support.
Banshee didn't work for me. I'm able to "copy" the files to the IPOD, but then I am not able to play them. They do not appear on the playlist.
Also read that our good friends in Macintosh killed the "friendly" ipod interface. I just wanted to know if it was corrected yet.
